SELECT A.NOTI_SEQ , A.FILE_GB , C.SUB_CODE_NM AS NOTI_NM, CASE WHEN IFNULL(B.USER_NM,'') <> '' THEN IFNULL(B.USER_NM,'') ELSE A.UPD_USER END USER_NM , DATE_FORMAT(A.START_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') START_DT , DATE_FORMAT(A.END_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') END_DT, A.USE_YN , IFNULL(A.HOSP_CD,'') HOSP_CD , A.NOTI_TITLE , A.NOTI_CONTENT , A.UPDATE_SW , IFNULL(A.NOTI_REDCNT,'') NOTI_REDCNT , A.REG_DTTM , A.REG_USER , A.REG_IP , A.UPD_DTTM , A.UPD_USER , A.UPD_IP FROM TBL_NOTI_MST A LEFT JOIN TBL_USER_MST B ON B.USER_ID = A.UPD_USER AND B.HOSP_CD = A.HOSP_CD AND B.ACTION_YN = A.ACTION_YN LEFT JOIN TBL_CODE_DTL C ON C.CODE_GB = 'Z' AND C.CODE_CD = 'NOTI_GB' AND C.SUB_CODE = A.FILE_GB AND C.ACTION_YN = A.ACTION_YN WHERE 1=1 AND A.ACTION_YN = 'Y' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND A.FILE_GB = #{fileGb}
AND DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN REPLACE(A.START_DT,'-','') AND REPLACE(A.END_DT,'-','') AND DATE_FORMAT(A.UPD_DTTM,'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN REPLACE(#{startDt},'-','') AND REPLACE(#{endDt},'-','')
AND (A.NOTI_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%'))
AND (A.NOTI_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%'))
AND (A.NOTI_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%') OR A.NOTI_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%'))
Order By A.UPD_DTTM DESC , A.UPDATE_SW DESC

SELECT A.NOTI_SEQ , A.FILE_GB , A.START_DT , A.END_DT , A.USE_YN , A.HOSP_CD , A.NOTI_TITLE , A.NOTI_CONTENT , A.UPDATE_SW , A.NOTI_REDCNT , A.REG_DTTM , A.REG_USER , A.REG_IP , A.UPD_DTTM , A.UPD_USER , A.UPD_IP , A.HOSP_UUID FROM TBL_NOTI_MST A WHERE 1=1 AND A.NOTI_SEQ = #{notiSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_NOTI_MST ( FILE_GB, START_DT, END_DT, USE_YN, HOSP_CD, NOTI_TITLE, NOTI_CONTENT, UPDATE_SW, NOTI_REDCNT, REG_DTTM, REG_USER, REG_IP, UPD_DTTM, UPD_USER, UPD_IP , HOSP_UUID ) VALUES ( #{fileGb}, REPLACE(#{startDt} , '-', ''), REPLACE(#{endDt} , '-', '') , #{useYn}, #{hospCd}, #{notiTitle}, #{notiContent}, #{updateSw}, #{notiRedcnt}, now(), #{regUser}, #{regIp}, now(), #{updUser}, #{updIp} , #{hospUuid} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_NOTI_MST SET START_DT = REPLACE(#{startDt} , '-', ''), END_DT = REPLACE(#{endDt} , '-', '') , USE_YN = #{useYn}, HOSP_CD = #{hospCd}, NOTI_TITLE = #{notiTitle}, NOTI_CONTENT = #{notiContent}, UPDATE_SW = #{updateSw}, UPD_DTTM = now(), UPD_USER = #{updUser}, UPD_IP = #{updIp} , HOSP_UUID = #{hospUuid} WHERE NOTI_SEQ = #{notiSeq} AND FILE_GB = #{fileGb}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.HOSP_CD, A.FILE_GB, A.QSTN_TITLE, A.ASQ_SEQ , CASE WHEN IFNULL(B.USER_NM,'') = '' THEN A.REG_USER ELSE B.USER_NM END USER_NM , C.HOSP_NM , A.QSTN_CONTS, A.ASQ_SHARE, IFNULL(A.ANSR_CONTS,'') ANSR_CONTS , A.UPDATE_SW, A.REG_DTTM, A.REG_USER, A.REG_IP, A.READ_CNT , A.UPD_DTTM, A.UPD_USER, A.UPD_IP, A.ANSR_DTTM, A.ANSR_USER, A.ANSR_IP, A.ANSR_UPD_DTTM, A.ANSR_UPD_USER, A.ANSR_UPD_IP , A.HOSP_UUID , A.QSTN_WAN , A.ANSR_WAN , CASE WHEN A.QSTN_WAN = 'Y' THEN '완료' ELSE '진행' END QSTN_STAT , CASE WHEN A.ANSR_WAN = 'Y' THEN '완료' ELSE '진행' END ANSR_STAT FROM TBL_ASQ_MST A LEFT JOIN TBL_USER_MST B ON B.USER_ID = A.REG_USER AND B.HOSP_CD = A.HOSP_CD AND B.ACTION_YN = A.ACTION_YN LEFT JOIN TBL_HOSP_MST C ON C.HOSP_CD = A.HOSP_CD AND C.ACTION_YN = A.ACTION_YN WHERE 1=1 AND A.ACTION_YN = 'Y'
AND A.HOSP_cd = #{hospCdasq}
AND (A.QSTN_TITLE LIKE CONCAT(#{qstnTitle},'%') OR A.QSTN_CONTS LIKE CONCAT(#{qstnTitle},'%') )
Order by A.UPD_DTTM DESC

SELECT A.FILE_GB, A.QSTN_TITLE, A.ASQ_SEQ , IFNULL(B.USER_NM,'') USER_NM , C.HOSP_NM , A.QSTN_CONTS, A.ASQ_SHARE, IFNULL(A.ANSR_CONTS,'') ANSR_CONTS , A.UPDATE_SW, A.REG_DTTM, A.REG_USER, A.REG_IP, A.READ_CNT , A.UPD_DTTM, A.UPD_USER, A.UPD_IP, IFNULL(A.QSTN_WAN,'') QSTN_WAN , IFNULL(A.ANSR_WAN,'') ANSR_WAN , CASE WHEN IFNULL(A.QSTN_WAN,'') = 'Y' THEN '질문완료' ELSE '질문진행' END QSTN_STAT , CASE WHEN IFNULL(A.ANSR_WAN,'') = 'Y' THEN '답변완료' ELSE '답변진행' END ANSR_STAT FROM TBL_ASQ_MST A LEFT JOIN TBL_USER_MST B ON B.USER_ID = A.REG_USER AND B.HOSP_CD = A.HOSP_CD AND B.ACTION_YN = A.ACTION_YN LEFT JOIN TBL_HOSP_MST C ON C.HOSP_CD = A.HOSP_CD AND C.ACTION_YN = A.ACTION_YN WHERE 1=1 AND A.ACTION_YN = 'Y' AND A.HOSP_CD = #{hospCd}
AND IFNULL(A.QSTN_WAN,'') = 'Y'
AND IFNULL(A.ANSR_WAN,'') = 'Y'
Order by A.REG_DTTM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ASQ_MST ( HOSP_CD, FILE_GB, QSTN_TITLE, QSTN_CONTS, REG_DTTM, REG_USER, REG_IP, UPD_DTTM, UPD_USER, UPD_IP, HOSP_UUID , QSTN_WAN, JOB_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{hospCdasq}, #{fileGbasq}, #{qstnTitle}, #{qstnConts}, NOW(), #{regUserasq}, #{regIp}, NOW(), #{updUserasq}, #{updIp}, #{hospUuidasq} , #{qstnWan}, (SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(A.JOB_SEQ) IS NOT NULL THEN MAX(A.JOB_SEQ) + 1 ELSE 1 END FROM TBL_ASQ_MST A WHERE A.HOSP_CD = #{hospCdasq} AND A.FILE_GB = #{fileGbasq} ) )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_ASQ_MST SET QSTN_TITLE = #{qstnTitle}, QSTN_CONTS = #{qstnConts}, REG_DTTM = NOW(), REG_USER = #{regUserasq}, REG_IP = #{regIp} , QSTN_WAN = #{qstnWan} WHERE ASQ_SEQ = #{asqSeq} AND FILE_GB = #{fileGbasq} AND ACTION_YN = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT QSTN_TITLE , QSTN_CONTS , IFNULL(QSTN_WAN,'') QSTN_WAN , ANSR_CONTS , IFNULL(ANSR_WAN,'') ANSR_WAN , UPDATE_SW , FILE_GB , ASQ_SEQ , REG_DTTM , REG_USER , REG_IP , UPD_DTTM , UPD_USER , UPD_IP FROM TBL_ASQ_MST WHERE ASQ_SEQ = #{asqSeq}

SELECT A.FAQ_SEQ , A.FILE_GB, A.QSTN_CONTS, IFNULL(A.ANSR_CONTS,'') AS ANSR_CONTS, A.REG_DTTM, A.REG_USER, A.REG_IP, A.UPD_DTTM, A.UPD_USER, A.UPD_IP , A.SORT_SEQ FROM TBL_FAQ_MST A WHERE 1=1 AND A.ACTION_YN = 'Y'
AND (A.QSTN_CONTS LIKE CONCAT(#{qstnConts},'%') OR A.ANSR_CONTS LIKE CONCAT(#{ansrConts},'%') )
Order by A.SORT_SEQ DESC
SELECT QSTN_CONTS , ANSR_CONTS , START_DT , END_DT , USE_YN , REG_DTTM , REG_USER , REG_IP , UPD_DTTM , UPD_USER , UPD_IP , SORT_SEQ FROM TBL_FAQ_MST WHERE FAQ_SEQ = #{faqSeq}

SELECT A.FILE_SEQ ,A.FILE_GB ,B.SUB_CODE_NM ,A.FILE_TITLE ,A.FILE_PATH ,A.FILE_SIZE ,A.HOSP_CD ,A.USE_YN ,A.REG_DTTM ,A.REG_USER ,A.REG_IP ,A.UPD_DTTM ,A.UPD_USER ,A.UPD_IP FROM TBL_FILE_MST A LEFT JOIN TBL_CODE_DTL B ON B.CODE_GB = 'Z' AND B.CODE_CD = 'NOTI_GB' AND B.SUB_CODE = A.FILE_GB AND B.ACTION_YN = A.ACTION_YN WHERE 1=1 AND A.ACTION_YN = 'Y' AND A.FILE_SEQ = #{fileSeq} AND A.FILE_GB = #{fileGb}
AND A.HOSP_CD = #{hospCd}
